name: 3dfim+
author: AFNI Team
description: Program to calculate the cross-correlation of an ideal reference waveform with the measured FMRI time series for each voxel.

inputs.description: Number of first dataset image to use in the cross-correlation procedure (default = 0)
inputs.name: Number of first dataset image

inputs.description: Number of last dataset image to use in the cross-correlation procedure (default = last)
inputs.name: Number of last dataset image

inputs.description: Degree of polynomial corresponding to the baseline model (default: 1). Use -1 for no baseline model.
inputs.name: Degree of baseline polynomial

inputs.description: FIM internal mask threshold value (0 <= p <= 1) to get rid of low intensity voxels (default: 0.0999)
inputs.name: Threshold value

inputs.description: Write (to screen) results for voxels whose correlation stat. > cval (0 <= cval <= 1; default: disabled)
inputs.name: Correlation display value

inputs.description: Input ort time series file name. Can be used multiple times.
inputs.name: Ort file

inputs.description: Input ideal time series file name. Can be used multiple times.
inputs.name: Ideal file

inputs.description: Output the specified parameter. Can be used multiple times. Possible values are: 'Fit Coef', 'Best Index', '% Change', 'Baseline', 'Correlation', '% From Ave', 'Average', '% From Top', 'Topline', 'Sigma Resid', 'All', 'Spearman CC', 'Quadrant CC'.
inputs.name: Output parameters

inputs.description: Create one AFNI 'bucket' dataset containing the parameters of interest, as specified by the '-out' commands. The output 'bucket' dataset is written to a file with the prefix name bprefix.
inputs.name: Output bucket prefix

output-files.description: Output bucket dataset containing fit parameters, in TLRC space.
output-files.name: Output bucket TLRC HEAD file

output-files.description: Output bucket dataset containing fit parameters, in TLRC space.
output-files.name: Output bucket TLRC BRIK file

output-files.description: Output bucket dataset containing fit parameters, in original space.
output-files.name: Output bucket original HEAD file

output-files.description: Output bucket dataset containing fit parameters, in original space.
output-files.name: Output bucket original BRIK file
